What is the correct way to resync? I don't want to accidentally screw something else up while trying to fix this problem.

> What is the correct way to resync? I don't want to accidentally screw something else up while trying to fix this problem.

### Simplest:

1. Close Nethermind properly (Ctrl + C)
2. Go to your Nethermind folder > Open `nethermind_db` and delete the folder of the network you want to resync. (e.g. `mainnet`)
3. Run nethermind as you would normally do.

### Slightly more advanced (keeping peer discovery):

1. Close Nethermind properly (Ctrl + C)
2. Go to your Nethermind folder > Open `nethermind_db` and go into the folder of the network you want to resync. (e.g. `mainnet`)
3. Delete every folder other than `discoveryNodes` and `peers`
4. Run nethermind as you would normally do.

---

The slightly more advanced approach will give a bit of head start on node discovery
